content.title: 50.清融 六冠中单

libsql /

      libsql---libSQL is a fork of SQLite that is both Open Source, and Open Contributions.

remoteintech /

      remote-jobs---A list of semi to fully remote-friendly companies (jobs) in tech.

psf /

      black---The uncompromising Python code formatter

facebookincubator /

      AITemplate---AITemplate is a Python framework which renders neural network into high performance CUDA/HIP C++ code. Specialized for FP16 TensorCore (NVIDIA GPU) and MatrixCore (AMD GPU) inference.

net4people /

      bbs---Forum for discussing Internet censorship circumvention

xcad2k /

      cheat-sheets---This is my personal knowledge-base. Here you'll find code-snippets, technical documentation, and command reference for various tools, and technologies.

snaplet /

      postgres-wasm---A PostgresQL server running in your browser

shubhamgrg04 /

      awesome-diagramming---A curated collection of diagramming tools used by leading software engineering teams

deepset-ai /

      haystack---🔍 Haystack is an open source NLP framework that leverages pre-trained Transformer models. It enables developers to quickly implement production-ready semantic search, question answering, summarization and document ranking for a wide range of NLP applications.

palera1n /

      palera1n---iOS 15.0-15.3.1 tethered checkm8 "jailbreak" (rootless is 15.0-15.7 semi-tethered, no tweaks)

SecureAuthCorp /

      impacket---Impacket is a collection of Python classes for working with network protocols.

pola-rs /

      polars---Fast multi-threaded DataFrame library in Rust | Python | Node.js

sourcegraph /

      sourcegraph---Universal code search (self-hosted)

public-apis /

      public-apis---A collective list of free APIs

sqlfluff /

      sqlfluff---A SQL linter and auto-formatter for Humans

huggingface /

      datasets---🤗 The largest hub of ready-to-use datasets for ML models with fast, easy-to-use and efficient data manipulation tools

nvm-sh /

      nvm---Node Version Manager - POSIX-compliant bash script to manage multiple active node.js versions

gradio-app /

      gradio---Create UIs for your machine learning model in Python in 3 minutes

helm /

      helm---The Kubernetes Package Manager

wagtail /

      wagtail---A Django content management system focused on flexibility and user experience

microsoft /

      PowerToys---Windows system utilities to maximize productivity

copy /

      v86---x86 virtualization in your browser, recompiling x86 to wasm on the fly

torvalds /

      linux---Linux kernel source tree

zhanwen /

      MathModel---研究生数学建模，本科生数学建模、数学建模竞赛优秀论文，数学建模算法，LaTeX论文模板，算法思维导图，参考书籍，Matlab软件教程，PPT

community /

      community---Public feedback discussions for: GitHub Mobile, GitHub Discussions, GitHub Codespaces, GitHub Sponsors, GitHub Issues and more!
